definition: at a distance of/distance/to be apart
to leave/to part from/to be away from/(in giving distances) from/without (sth)/independent of/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing fire/☲

sentences.english: Training cycle are reasonable, in line with the characteristics of long-distance endurance.
sentences.chinese: 训练周期安排合理，符合长距离耐力项目的特点。

sentences.english: Some will not be amenable to long-distance synchronizations.
sentences.chinese: 一些用户可能无法接受长距离的同步。

sentences.english: Pugh is the only person to have completed a long distance swim in each of the five oceans of the world.
sentences.chinese: 普是全球惟一一位在五大洋中完成长距离游泳的人。

sentences.english: The product is suitable for the preparation of high-flow concrete required for long-range transportation.
sentences.chinese: 适用于制备需长距离运输的高流态混凝土。

sentences.english: Suitable for equipped in the case that the up-down step distance of lathe machine is too short or too long.
sentences.chinese: 适装于冲床上下行程过短或过长距离送料的情形下。

sentences.english: The police grabbed the robbers after a long chase.
sentences.chinese: 警察经过长距离追赶后逮住了抢劫犯。

sentences.english: He claims that he has broken the record for long-distance flying.
sentences.chinese: 他声称他已打破了长距离飞行的纪录。

sentences.english: At the same time, most of our long runs are endurance-focused.
sentences.chinese: 同时，我们的长距离跑大多数是以耐力为主。

sentences.english: The next generation of long distance land-transportation is still in experimental phase in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 长距离的交通工具革新在美国仍然没有摆脱实验阶段。

sentences.english: An all-LED blue light is housed in the device, offering visibility at long distances.
sentences.chinese: 设备上有个全LED蓝光灯，增大长距离下的能见度。

sentences.english: Better than the ski lift over long distances.
The knees do not have to come up very high for long distance runners.
sentences.chinese: 很多长距离跑步者最大的问题就是步长过大。

sentences.english: On the flat, there are sprints, middle distance races and long distance races.
sentences.chinese: 平跑项目有短跑，中距离和长距离。

sentences.english: Reduce the long-run mileage the week before the race to no more than five miles.
sentences.chinese: 在比赛前一周把长距离跑步减到5英里或更少。

sentences.english: It will be a long hike, 30 miles in three days.
sentences.chinese: 这将是一趟长距离的徒步旅行，三天走30英里。

sentences.english: Notable application of power electronics is HVI)C power transmission over long distance.
sentences.chinese: 电力在高压下作长距离输送，能耗比低压时小。

definition: to stop in the middle of sth/intermittent/intermittence
to surmount obstacles/assault course for training troops
to slide/to coast/to glide/(of an aircraft) to taxi
